title: ERROR: you have encountered an error, please try again later
body: this pops up when ever i try to buy rp on my credit card and i looked at your page and it says something about resetting internet explorer but im on mac so i reset chrome and safari but it still doesnt work

replies.body: The error message might be misleading, and the issue could be with the method of payment being used if it's happening at that moment.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can help out.  We'll see what's up!
